name: Herbed Citrus Salmon
author: Diamond Crystal Salt
summary: Salmon fillets are marinated in an orange-thyme mixture, baked until tender, then topped with citrus-herb butter.
ingredients: ½ cup freshly squeezed orange juice
¼ teaspoon Diamond Crystal® Coarse Sea Salt
¼ teaspoon Diamond Crystal® Coarse Sea Salt
1 tablespoon coarsely chopped Italian parsley leaves
directions: Stir together orange juice, thyme and Diamond Crystal® Coarse Sea Salt in a shallow dish until salt is dissolved
Place salmon into the marinade and coat on each side
Arrange pieces skin side up in the dish, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate 30 minutes
Citrus Herbed Butter: Combine butter, Diamond Crystal® Coarse Sea Salt, orange zest, thyme, rosemary, parsley, and orange juice in a bowl
Mix well to form a spreadable paste
Remove salmon from marinade and pat dry with paper towels
Arrange fillets skin side down on baking dish
Drizzle with olive oil to coat
Set oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler
Broil fish until the fish flakes easily with a fork, about 5 minutes
Top fish with 1 teaspoon of Citrus Herbed Butter and a generous pinch of Diamond Crystal® Coarse Sea Salt
